thread.title: Global stocks fall AGAIN amid fears over China markets and hints of US interest rate hike
thread.title_full: Global stocks fall AGAIN amid fears over China markets and hints of US interest rate hike

title: Global stocks fall AGAIN amid fears over China markets and hints of US interest rate hike
text:
Global stocks fall AGAIN amid fears over China markets and hints of US interest rate hike Global stocks fall AGAIN amid fears over China markets and hints of US interest rate hike GLOBAL stock markets have plunged again following a turbulent month, amid fears of Chinese economic slowdown and a possible US interest rate hike. PUBLISHED: 18:22, Mon, Aug 31, 2015 | UPDATED: 18:39, Mon, Aug 31, 2015 GETTY Global stock markets have faced a turbulent month 
European shares suffered their worst monthly performance in four years today, while across the pond investors also witnessed a drop in the market. 
The Dow Jones industrial average fell 40 points, or 0.2 per cent, to 16,603 this afternoon. 
It finished 1.1 per cent up last week, but was on track for its worst monthly fall since May 2012. Related articles Savers warned over 'catastrophic' effects of falling markets on... 
Today also saw the S&P 500 decline by 0.3 per cent and the Nasdaq Composite drop 0.2 per cent. 
Closer to home, the pan-European FTSEurofirst 300 index closed down 0.2 percent to record a monthly loss of 9 percent - its worst monthly performance since August 2011. 
The DAX in Germany fell 0.4 per cent and also recorded its worst monthly performance since August 2011. Related articles
